‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑É‡∑ö‡∂± ‡∂ö‡∑î‡∂∏‡∑è‡∂ª‡∂∫‡∑è ‡∑É‡∂Ç‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑ä‡∂¥‡∂∫ ‡∂Ω‡∂Ç‡∂ö‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∑ä ‡∂¥‡∑ä‚Äç‡∂ª‡∂ö‡∂ß ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∑Å‡∑ä‡∑Ä‡∑è‡∑É‡∂∫‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂Ω‡∑ô‡∑É ‡∑É‡∑ê‡∂Ω‡∂ö‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è. ‡∂í ‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑É‡∑ö‡∂± ‡∂±‡∂∏‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∑î‡∂∏‡∂ª‡∂ö‡∑î ‡∂¥‡∑Ñ‡∂Ω‡∑Ä‡∑ì ‡∂Ω‡∂Ç‡∂ö‡∑è‡∑Ä ‡∂∫‡∑Ö‡∑í‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∑É‡∂Ø‡∑è‡∂†‡∑è‡∂ª‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂∏‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂∏ ‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑î‡∂´‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂Ø ‡∂Ω‡∑ù‡∂ö‡∂∫‡∑ö ‡∂â‡∑Ñ‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂≠‡∂∂‡∑è ‡∂∂‡∑î‡∂Ø‡∑î ‡∑É‡∑É‡∑î‡∂± ‡∂Ü‡∂ª‡∂ö‡∑ä‡∑Ç‡∑è ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂± ‡∂∂‡∑Ä‡∂ß‡∂∫‡∑í.‡∂Ö‡∂Ø ‡∑Ä‡∂± ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂ß ‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∑Ä‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂≠ ‡∑É‡∂Ø‡∑è‡∂†‡∑è‡∂ª ‡∂¥‡∂ª‡∑í‡∑Ñ‡∑è‡∂±‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫ ‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂ö‡∑í ‡∑É‡∂∏‡∂∫‡∂ö ‡∑Ä‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂Ø ‡∂∏‡∑ô‡∂∏ ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∑Å‡∑ä‡∑Ä‡∑è‡∑É‡∂∫ ‡∂≠‡∑Ä‡∂Ø‡∑î‡∂ª‡∂ß‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∂¢‡∂±‡∂≠‡∑è‡∑Ä ‡∂Ö‡∂≠‡∂ª ‡∂â‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂ª‡∑í‡∑Ä ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂õ‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è. ‡∂∏‡∑ô‡∑ä ‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑É‡∑ö‡∂± ‡∂ö‡∑î‡∂∏‡∂ª‡∑î ‡∑É‡∂Ç‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑ä‡∂¥‡∂∫ ‡∑Ñ‡∑è ‡∂í ‡∂¥‡∑í‡∑Ö‡∑í‡∂∂‡∂Ø ‡∂¥‡∑Ö‡∑Ä‡∂± ‡∑É‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∑Å‡∑ö‡∑Ç ‡∂Ö‡∂±‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑ê‡∂ö‡∑í ‡∑Ñ‡∑è ‡∂Ö‡∂Ø‡∑Ñ‡∑É‡∑ä ‡∂¥‡∑í‡∑Ö‡∑í‡∂∂‡∂Ø‡∂∫‡∑í. 

Traditional timeshare ownership refers to the purchase of an interval of usage at a single resort. Ownership is usually tied to a particular unit or unit type (one, two, three bedroom) and falls within a set week or within a season (a specific time of year or range of weeks when the owner can use his/her timeshare).

Keywords:
timeshare 
Ownership 
Insurance
season

comments.comment:
Diyasen kumaru wadina thek bala siteema sinhalayin widiyata api awurudu ganak karala thiyenawa....
Namuth mathaka thiyaganna wenawa ipadenna inna diyasenala thimbiri geyidima maradanna misaditu balawega kriyathmaka wenawa kiyala...
Dharmapala thuma e gana wisiwana siyawasa mul kaledima kiyapu de ada sathya wela thiyanawa....
E nisa awashyawenne diyasena balawegaya shakthimath karanna sinhalayin widiyata thamange adhyathmaya shakthimath karaganeema....
Jathikathwaya gana jathyalaya gana jathiwaadaya gana hangeem hithwala purawaganna eka....
Me sinhala wachana pawa waradiyata arthakathanaya karala thiyenne warthamanaye...
Mulinma api niwaradiwa sinhala bhashawa igenaganna one....
Mak nisadayath
Bhashawa jathiyeth sanskruthiyeth ananyathawaya wana nisa....
comments.author: nuwan chinthaka

comments.comment:
kawda me diyasena kumaru kiyanne..... hari hemoma balaporoththu wenne diyasen kumarayek nam mulinma minissunge aakalpa wenas kara ganna sidda wenawa.... me kiyana charitha lakshana rata adraya kireema hemogema hadawath walata kawaddaganna.. hema kenekma diyasena kenek wenna uthsaha karanna ethakota puluwan me diyasena sankalpaya ismathu karaganna....... thaman guna yahapath weddi thamata dawa upadina daruwata pawa a charitha lakshana yaawi... anna ethakota puluwan wewi anagatha param parawakin apita dharmishta eka palakayek witharak newe eweni palakayan kihipayakma bihi karanna.......... ratata jathiyata agamata aadre nam mulinma karanna oona thaman e vidihata anuwarthanaya weemak... ethakata eka diyasena kenek witharak newe ooona tharam diyasena kumarawaru apita indeewi
Show less
